Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 14.105" appears on the bottom right. Orientation: Vertical
Description: Text in French says come to the opera house on the 18th and 19th of December to dinner. Illustration shows a women emptying a basket of fruit and flowers.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Venez le 18 et le 19 December au Foyer de L'Opera
